Package org.csveed.bean

package org.csveed.bean
The package responsible for converting Rows to Beans. In here are the classes needed for reading class structures, configuring the mapping and executing the conversion from Row to Bean.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.csveed.bean.conversion
    This package contains what remains of the Spring Beans package after the operation to remove Spring from the library.

    DynamicColumn
